articles.author: Ellen Francis, Beatriz Ríos
articles.title: A divided E.U. races against time to tap Russian assets for Ukraine - The Washington Post
articles.description: The European Union is set to decide whether to move on Russia’s frozen assets, infuriating Moscow, possibly antagonizing the United States, to fund Ukraine.
articles.content:
The European Union is set to decide whether to move on Russias frozen assets, infuriating Moscow, possibly antagonizing the United States, to fund Ukraine.
Updated December 18, 2025 at 10:51 a.m. ES… [+13 chars]
